channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Netflix is live broadcasting ‘Free Solo’ climber Alex Honnold’s ascent of this Taipei skyscraper

item.title: Built to last: governance for multigenerational family businesses
item.description: When starting a company, nimble decision-making and founder-led intuition are often hallmarks of success. More structure is needed with complexity.

item.title: 33-year-old former flight attendant posed as pilot and got hundreds of free tickets over 4-year span, authorities say. Why it worked is a mystery

item.title: Why AI’s greatest challenge is leadership, not innovation
item.description: CEOs reveal how AI, social media and bold leadership are shaping the future of business.

item.title: McDonald’s CEO shares tough love career advice he’d give Gen Z and young millennial workers: ‘No one cares about your career’

item.title: These 3 Skills Will Define High-Performing Employees in 2026

item.title: Keep Forgetting Things? To Improve Your Memory and Recall, Science Says Start Taking Notes (By Hand)
item.description: And then do a quick review the next morning.

item.title: The U.S. homicide rate is plunging in dozens of cities, including these, data shows

item.title: Hollywood actors and artists just made a move against AI slop

item.title: Apple Spent Years Downplaying AI Chatbots. Now Siri Is Becoming One
item.description: A new report from Bloomberg suggests Apple is turning Siri into an AI chatbot.

item.title: Welcome to the ‘skills mismatch economy’: the shift from roles to skills making your resume—and your job title—meaningless

item.title: Entrepreneurship Is Booming in America—Why 2026 Could Set All‑Time Records

item.title: Am I Not Cut Out for Managing People?
item.description: I’ve made one bad hire after another.
